definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Sigourney Weaver plays a botanist overseeing the exploration.
sentences.chinese: 维弗扮演一位植物学家，监督这次探险。

sentences.english: China's plant life is enormously rich.
sentences.chinese: 《中国植物志》是几代中国植物学家努力的结果。
你是植物学家，约翰逊博士？

sentences.english: Nicotiana tabacum, as botanists call it, was the first global commodity craze.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家所称作的烟草，是世界上第一股商品狂潮。

sentences.english: Botanists refer this flower to the rose family.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家将这花归入蔷薇科。

sentences.english: Botanists have cultivated many flowers with the seed branch.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家用种条培养了许多的花。

sentences.english: Botanists believe that crosses between pomelo and wild orange created grapefruit.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家相信柚子和野生桔子的杂交产生了葡萄柚。

sentences.english: Some botanists hypothesized that the living cells of plants acted as pumps.
sentences.chinese: 有些植物学家假设植物活细胞作为泵浦。

sentences.english: For instance a botanist may study one particular plant.
sentences.chinese: 比如，一个植物学家可能只研究一种特殊的植物。

sentences.english: We shall not, he went to table a botanist consult.
sentences.chinese: 百思不得乓解，他便去请教一位植物学家。

sentences.english: Botanists believed that the species is extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家相信本种已在野外绝灭。

sentences.english: A botanist can differentiate varieties of plants.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家能区分各种不同的植物。

sentences.english: Botanists have succeeded in developing many new plants.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家成功地培育出了许多植物新品种。

sentences.english: This is the famed tropical botanist Cai Xitao with his students.
sentences.chinese: 这就是著名的热带植物学家蔡希陶先生和他的学生们。

sentences.english: And we have a botanist named Fred Coville to thank.
sentences.chinese: 这里我们应该感谢植物学家弗雷德康维尔。

sentences.english: Botanists have had no more success than historians.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家也不比历史学家成功。
